title: Competency Development Program for Sports Coaching Policy Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Core sports coaching principles and experience in organizational policy development
context.additional_context: A course focused on analyzing policy implementation cases for organizational culture improvement and strengthening practical application competencies

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to design a stakeholder needs analysis and reflection process in sports coaching policy development
Strengthening the capacity to establish and evaluate effective policy implementation strategies that drive organizational culture change
Deriving policy improvement solutions through practitioner collaboration and applying project management techniques
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
